OEM Commercial Licenses ***********************

Frequently-Asked Questions **************************
When do I need an OEM license? ==============================
You only need an OEM license if you want to distribute proprietary products based on the OpenAMQ source code. If you simply want to use the OpenAMQ client libraries and the OpenAMQ server, you do not need an OEM license.
How much does an OEM license cost? ==================================
Please send an email to sales at iMatix dot com, with information about your OEM product proposal.
Is the free OpenAMQ software complete? ======================================
Some functionality developed for OEM customer may not be included in the free OpenAMQ software version. However we strive to make OpenAMQ the most complete package possible.
